value:
$WmMPID_花嫁アンナ覚醒,ch04_39_Anna_F_Wedding22,Face|Alright, enough dillydallying. Let's
see those smiles, everyone! Three...
Two... One... Aaand done!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シグルーン,ch09_11_Sigurun_F_Wedding19,Face|My, what a splendid picture. This will
make a wonderful memento indeed.
Thank you.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁アンナ覚醒,ch04_39_Anna_F_Wedding22,Face|Don't mention it! Still, while I'd love
to stop and chat, we need to keep
the line moving, sooo... NEXT!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ララム,ch02_22_Lalum_F_Wedding22,Face|Oh! Is it finally my turn?$k$pI can't wait to show Father how cute
his lovely Larum looked in her very
own wedding dress!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁アンナ覚醒,ch04_39_Anna_F_Wedding22,Face|Right, right. I know you're excited,
but please hold still. We wouldn't
want you to end up out of frame.$k$p...All right, looking good. Ready or
not, here we go! Three... Two—$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Ah. I thought I heard a commotion,
and who should I find but another
of Commander Anna's sisters...$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁アンナ覚醒,ch04_39_Anna_F_Wedding22,Face|Ack! I mean—Prince Alfonse! How
nice to see you on this fine day!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Wait... That looks like Commander
Anna's Snapshot tome. Don't tell
me you're planning to—$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁アンナ覚醒,ch04_39_Anna_F_Wedding22,Face|What, sell these lovely portraits? No
way! I would never charge anyone for
this special service.$k$pListen, Alfonse. Strutting around in
a wedding dress is something that
every girl dreams of.$k$pAfter they get back to their worlds,
they may not have another chance
to put on such a showy display.$k$pBut! With the Snapshot tome, I can
capture this wonderful moment
for them in picture-perfect form!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I can see why people appreciate
having these pictures, but that's
exactly why I need to make sure.$k$pAnna. Are you really not planning
to turn a profit from all of this?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁アンナ覚醒,ch04_39_Anna_F_Wedding22,Face|I swear on my trusty ledger!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Very well... Please, carry on. As far
as anyone else need be concerned,
I neither saw nor heard a thing.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁アンナ覚醒,ch04_39_Anna_F_Wedding22,Face|Attaboy!$k$p

$WmMPID_花嫁アンナ覚醒,ch04_39_Anna_F_Wedding22,Face|Whew. Has everyone had their
picture taken? I don't see anyone
else in line, at least.$k$pGuess that means it's time to hand
the Snapshot tome back to my sister.$k$pBuuuut before that, I'd better make
copies of everyone's pictures.
Y'know, just in case.$k$pThings get lost or destroyed all the
time, so keeping a backup is sure to
pay off in the end, right?$k$pThere's definitely no ulterior motive
here. Nope, none at all! ...Alright, that
should do it.$k$pNow to return the... Hmm. Maybe
there is one last customer after all...$k$pBut how do I angle this thing?
Well, here goes nothing. Three...
Two... One!$k$pHehe... Quite the looker, if I do say so
myself. Is this how the other girls felt?$k$pI'm definitely starting to get the
appeal! Getting your picture taken
while dolled up is a real thrill.$k$pI guess I never really thought about
how it feels on the other side of the
tome, huh?$k$pWait a minute—doesn't that mean
I did something REALLY good for
those girls?$k$pSomething so good, in fact, that
I might just be forgiven for making
a few secret copies of their pictures!$k$pWell, that's enough excitement for
one day. I'm sure my sister wants her
tome back already.$k$pStill, doing a good deed sure feels
great. I could definitely get used to it!$k$p
